body_html: Yes, cudnn.h for 5.1.10 defines CUDNN_BN_EPSILON to be 1e-5 (minimum allowable value). I can't check header for 5.1.5. Even with 1e-5 epsilon for many input data distributions the results become pretty unstable. Is there a case for this restriction to be lifted, does using very small epsilon provide benefits?
